getArenaSessionData(uint256).details: Returns the address of the Mothora Game Hub Contract*

getMothoraGame().details: Returns the address of the Mothora Game Hub Contract

getPlayerInSession(address).details: Returns the id of the arena the player is in, 0 if not playing*

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setMothoraGame(address).details: Updates the address of the Mothora Game

params.players: The addresses of players that will participate in the arena*

terminateArenaSession(uint256).details: Finishes sessions that can be "terminated"This function could fetch off-chain information such as winning players through a chainlink adapterFor the current purpose will only determine rewards randomly and give a guaranteed extra reward to the callee of this function

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.
